    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"

>
[Mysterious Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=6222) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 180 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Oracle](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=233)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Oracle Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=6219)

</column>

---

Increase the spell slots you gain from oracle archetype feats by 1 for each spell rank other than your two highest spell ranks.
name: Mysterious Breadth
